summary:
AI-driven fraud detection analyzes transactions instantly, scoring risk levels to flag suspicious activity before losses occur.  
Webhook integration enables real-time ingestion of financial events for seamless automation.  
OpenAI GPT-4 powers fraud analysis, dynamically calculating risk and branching workflow actions.  
High-risk transactions are held, alerts sent to fraud teams, and incidents logged in Google Sheets for compliance tracking.  
Easy setup with webhook, OpenAI API, Gmail alerts, and customizable risk thresholds.  
Versatile for payment processors and fintech platforms; adjustable scoring logic and urgent phone/SMS alerts available.  
Rapid fraud detection reduces financial losses by up to 90%.
